content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_door
inventory=[{"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "cyan_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 27, "index": 23}, {"type": "oak_slab", "quantity": 35, "index": 27}, {"type": "grindstone", "quantity": 60, "index": 29}, {"type": "oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 33, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 2, "index": 35}, {"type": "magenta_concrete_powder", "quantity": 58, "index": 38}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 31, "index": 39}]

thought: To craft a warped door I need to craft warped planks. Warped planks require 1 warped hyphae which is located at slot 35. Therefore, I will move the warped hyphae into the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_door
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "cyan_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 27, "index": 23}, {"type": "oak_slab", "quantity": 35, "index": 27}, {"type": "grindstone", "quantity": 60, "index": 29}, {"type": "oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 33, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "magenta_concrete_powder", "quantity": 58, "index": 38}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 31, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that I have crafted warped planks, I need to store them in my inventory. I will move them to slot 11 since it is free.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: To craft warped door I need to craft warped planks. To do so I need to place a warped hyphae into the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the warped hyphae from slot 35 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "cyan_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 27, "index": 23}, {"type": "oak_slab", "quantity": 35, "index": 27}, {"type": "grindstone", "quantity": 60, "index": 29}, {"type": "oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 33, "index": 31}, {"type": "magenta_concrete_powder", "quantity": 58, "index": 38}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 31, "index": 39}]

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
